entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -9.0°C

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
